synopsis.text: Shiki awakens from a coma and begins rebuilding her life, while a series of gruesome murders grips the city, occurring for the first time in four years. The killings evoke disturbing memories in Shiki of her own murderous past. Her colleague Mikiya sets out to prove Shiki's innocence and unravel the mystery, tracing the crimes to an illicit drug trade involving their former high school senior Rio Shirazumi. As Shiki struggles to suppress her resurfacing homicidal urges, Mikiya races to identify the true killer, determined to save Shiki, both from suspicion and her own inner demons.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
